title: What are those stuff?
body: What do i do with those things?

replies.body:
These items are called **Hextech Loot**, which is part of the system called Hextech Crafting! This allows you to earn hextech loot from playing games (in the form of Hextech Chests, Mastery Tokens, and Key Fragments. We have a **HUGE GUIDE** that goes over this entire system, which you can find [**HERE.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) I strongly recommend giving that guide a once-over so you can get a good understanding of how this all works.

If the guide didn't answer any additional questions you had about the Hextech Crafting system, please feel free to reach back out to me in a reply. ^.^

I believe that Garen and Ashe are free, so you can click on their shards and then proceed to click, 'unlock' to add them to your champion pool.
The two skin fragments are for Pantheon and Garen; you will need a certain amount of _orange essence_ (from opening or dischanting other skin fragments, you can get from buying Hextech Chests) to unlock those.  The ward skin can also be unlocked through orange essence, and all it does it change how your ward looks like in game.

Here is the Hextech 101 page:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html
